alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Houston; Peach; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bibb, west central Twiggs, northeastern Peach and north central Houston Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Rutland, or near Macon, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Robins Air Force Base, Marion, Skipperton, Rutland, Elberta, Franklinton, Middle Georgia Regional Airport and Huber. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
